Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: '—Babylonia Outpost.'}
{3: 'Watanabe departed a while ago due to his allegiance, while the people you are meeting have already arrived at the outpost, according to the message you received.'}
{3: 'The headlights from your vehicle light up the entrance to the outpost, and you find two female Constructs standing there, waiting for you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '【kuroname】. Happy to see you again.', 4: '2'}
{2: "...It's been a while.", 3: '10', 4: 'The pleasure is mine.', 5: '12'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Better we see you less! After all, every time we run into you... some weird shit's gonna happen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "...But nothing unusual this time, luckily. You'll have to travel with us for the remaining journey.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I know it might be a bit unexpected, but Karen and I will be accompanying you and supporting you for the rest of your assignment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Please don't take it the wrong way. We're here for the same reason you are. As to where we've been... just consider our meeting a coincidence.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Obviously. We are definitely not here because of how bothersome Gray Raven has been or because Lucia asked us to.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Also, Asimov has talked to us, and before he gathers all the test data, you're in charge of bringing our test mechanoid back to Babylonia as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's simple—we're all heading back to Babylonia. Nothing weird for us to share a ride.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Karenina speaks, Bianca has already opened a comms channel.'}
{3: 'Although you cannot tell who she is talking to, judging by her phrases and expression, the person on the other end is surely someone important in Babylonia.'}
{3: 'Bianca does not turn back immediately after the call has ended. A Construct stationed at the outpost steps forward and talks to her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "...It's one thing for Constructs to have no holidays at all. It's another to ask you to go on a mission at this time of the year.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What an odd fella, that Asimov. What's the obsession with data?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A mission is a mission.', 3: '25', 4: 'Thanks for your hard work, Karenina.', 5: '26'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "True. It's an emergency mission, after all. And I don't dislike this cute little critter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Don't say shit like this all of a sudden! What am I, a child?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm quite familiar with the development of the CUBs. After all, I was responsible for developing the power system...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina carefully goes through and examines the CUB after receiving it. The level of attention is not far from a professional's."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "The completed version is even more detailed than I thought... I hope the Forsaken bunch didn't break the damn thing... or implanted some weird shit on it...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're overthinking things.", 3: '33'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "(Chuckles) Who knows? It's never smart to trust someone blindly... How the hell have you survived to this day?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So have you found anything?', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Not yet... But! Those Forsaken...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Karenina is going to continue before Bianca returns and stops her.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "The results of the CUB project will be inspected by Asimov... We don't have to get involved.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Our mission is also assigned with similar concerns, so we don't have to reveal too much. Also... I just talked to the other team members, and I've received some unexpected intel.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...Intel? Bianca, what kind of intel?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We'll discuss the details after we've entered the guard post in City 015 proper.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'The conservation area?', 3: '44'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Let's find something to do before you're back on Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The road to the conservation area outpost is calm and quiet. The track has been repaired, so the journey is far from tiring.'}
{3: 'Apart from an argument on who gets to drive the vehicle, everything has been going smoothly.'}
{3: 'Suffice to say, the saying "Don\'t let Karenina go near the cockpit!" probably originates here.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory30.jpg'}
{3: 'Once you have arrived in City 015, Karenina disappears the moment she leaves the vehicle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "If there's nothing else to attend to, maybe we'll speak in length later about what we mentioned in the outpost, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll talk later, then.", 3: '58'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'By the way... Have you seen where Karenina has gone to? I might have missed her when we arrived.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Now that you mention it, I haven't seen her either...", 3: '60'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'Miss Bianca, are you talking about the girl in the hood?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct A', 3: 'She has left for the old commercial district in the city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct A', 3: 'We showed her this when you were unpacking.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca takes the sample the Construct passes her and examines it. The graffiti on the box looks familiar.'}
{3: 'After identification, you are almost certain that it matches the graffiti previously found in City 015.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: "I'm sure you've heard about it before you arrived at our guard post?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "(Nods) ...That's what I wanted to talk to you about.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The graffiti symbol and the unusual Corrupted activities that follow its trail signify a Corrupted whose function has advanced beyond the norm. The target might be self-aware.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Despite ruling out many possibilities, there is still something that... concerns me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'There was a similar Corrupted in the past—"Nozzle", the one that only 【kuroname】 here has come into contact with before.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'For safety reasons, I was hoping to invite you to investigate with me to make sure we can keep everything under control. But Karen... she really is an impulsive one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant, I know this is not your duty, but can I ask for your assistance before the extraction team from Babylonia arrives?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti symbols...', 3: '77', 4: 'Unusual Corrupted activities...', 5: '78'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "As the only commandant who has made contact with one, I'm sure you still remember it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'It is an unverified "phenomenon," and there\'s no way for us to confirm the accuracy and authenticity of the intel...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Both of these concerns call for a more secure approach. We'll count on you for the operation ahead of us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Bianca tries to locate Karenina with her comms, Karenina calls her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karenina?! Where did you go? Have you gone investigating the graffiti symbols by yourself?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "The symbols are real, but you don't have the slightest clue what it actually is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'What it actually is? Are you saying that the graffiti points to something else entirely?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's why I have to call you—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bianca can see my coordinates, right? I'll be waiting for you there in 15 minutes! Now, move! I don't like waiting!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Hello? Hey? Karen?! Sigh... she hung up.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I guess we'll have to go there?", 3: '91'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Apparently. She's even brought the CUB with her... What is she up to?", 4: '1'}
